name: xformers
summary: XFormers: A collection of composable Transformer building blocks.

chunks.text: XFormers: A collection of composable Transformer building blocks.XFormers aims at being able to reproduce most architectures in the Transformer-family SOTA,defined as compatible and combined building blocks as opposed to monolithic models

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary:

This library is used to compose and combine building blocks to efficiently reproduce a wide range of state-of-the-art (SOTA) architectures within the Transformer family. With XFormers, developers can easily mix-and-match compatible components to create complex transformer models without having to implement each architecture from scratch.
